thread.title: Heiner C T Gringmuth
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Heiner C T Gringmuth

author: Heiner C T Gringmuth
title: Heiner C T Gringmuth
text:
One year ago I bought a Homtom HT6 smartphone (very good phone) via internet from LightInTheBox.
Now the speaker is not working and no ringtone.
I like to send the phone back for repair under the 2 year warranty, every thing is covert by law in Denmark.
LightInThebox rejects my claim in the first request.
But after a correspondence with a staff member, Pinni, I got promised a Smartphone as a replacement. That means that it is safe for danish customers to buy from LightInTheBox. They have a lot of good stuff.
Best regards Heiner Gringmuth
